name: Mihboo
description:
This is my short little game I made in th first semester at Htk academy. 

Help Mihboo to save his partner from the scientists who are trying to dissect her to find out what kind of creature they are. 

Collect 12 keyfragments and find the "EXIT" to enter the next level but watch out for enemys they like to kill you with just one hit!

it is on you wether she gets killed or saved by her little hero.
